fields.description: Custom fields to return in the error response.

ParkingSpotDto.description: Response model for a parking spot.

id.description: The id of the vehicle service

displayName.description: Display name of the vehicle service

duration.description: The duration of the vehicle service

VehicleServiceDto.description: Data transfer object for the Vehicle Service class, holding information about the service's display name

userAccountUUID.description: The UUID of the associated user account.

EmployeeDto.description: Request and response model for an employee.

startTime.description: The start time of the schedule entry.

endTime.description: The end time of the schedule entry.

maxIncrementTime.description: Max increment time of the configuration

OplsConfigurationDto.description: Request and response model for the system configuration.

UpdateUserAccountRequestDto.description: Model for a request to update user information.

claims.description: List of claims associated to user account

ResetSecurityQuestionAnswerRequestDto.description: Model for a reset security question and answer request.

username.description: The username to log in with. Required for password grants.

password.description: The password to log in with. Required for password grants.

refreshToken.description:
The refresh token to identify the session. Required for refresh_token
 grants.

unbooked.description: Whether to only search for parking spots without bookings.

floors.description: The set of floors to search on. Defaults to all.

statuses.description: The set of statuses to search for. Defaults to all.

vehicleTypes.description: The set of vehicle types to search for. Defaults to all.

ParkingSpotQueryRequestDto.description: Search request for parking spots. Contains all possible queryable fields.

ParkingSpotQueryResponseDto.description: Result for a parking spot search.

creditCardNumber.description: The credit card number to pay for the booking.

vehicleType.description: Requested vehicle type. Must be VehicleType.REGULAR.

MonthlySpotBookingRequestDto.description: Request for a monthly parking spot booking.

parkingSpotId.description: Parking spot for the booking, null if not yet assigned.

cost.description: Amount charged to the payment method.

SpotBookingResponseDto.description: Response for a parking spot booking response.

parkingSpotId.description: The parking spot for the booking.

creditCardNumber.description: The credit card number to pay for the booking.

duration.description: Length of the booking in minutes.

vehicleType.description: Requested vehicle type. Must match with the parking spot.

IncrementalSpotBookingRequestDto.description: Request for an incremental parking spot booking.

creditCardNumber.description: The credit card number to pay for the booking.

ServiceBookingRequestDto.description: Request model for a vehicle service booking.

cost.description: Amount charged to the payment method.

creditCardNumber.description: The credit card number to pay for the booking.

ServiceBookingDto.description: Response model for a vehicle service booking.

queryOwn.description: Whether to only query the user's own bookings.

startDate.description: The start date of the query range.

endDate.description: The end date of the query range.

ServiceBookingQueryRequestDto.description: Request model for querying vehicle service bookings.

savedLicensePlate.description: The saved license plate of the customer.

billingAccountId.description: The billing account id of the customer.

userUuid.description: The uuid of the associated user account.

CustomerDto.description: Request and response model for a customer.

parkingSpotId.description: Parking spot for the booking, null if not yet assigned.

PatchSpotBookingRequestDto.description: Response for a parking spot booking request.

UpdateServiceBookingRequestDto.description: Request model to update a vehicle service booking.

SecurityQuestionResponseDto.description: Response model for a security question.
